synopsis:
A TV special of Gakkou no Kaidan that aired almost 5 months after the original anime. However, this event takes place before the Finale episode of the TV series.
The story focuses on a headless motorcycle rider.

title.en: Ghost Stories: The Headless Horsemen!! Curse of Death
title.jp: Gakkou no Kaidan: Kubinashi Rider!! Shi no Noroi
